title: ICE when using RUSTDOC_LOG=rustdoc on a doc build

labels.name: T-rustdoc
labels.description: Relevant to the rustdoc team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: A-contributor-roadblock
labels.description: Area: Makes things more difficult for new contributors to rust itself

body:
I ran into this while working on #80466. ### Code ```rust pub struct S {} ``` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.51.0-dev binary: rustc commit-hash: unknown commit-date: unknown host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.51.0-dev ``` I built this dev version of rustc from 206ee1eea3467fd1d7f1efdbeafe27880897bb2c with `./x.py -i --stage 1 build library/std src/tools/rustdoc` with the default `./x.py setup compiler`. This only occurs when using `RUSTDOC_LOG=rustdoc` during the documentation build. I'm running `RUSTDOC_LOG=rustdoc cargo +dev doc` where the `dev` toolchain is linked to my development build and the only source file in the project (edition 2018) is `src/lib.rs` containing the previously specified code. ### Error output I trimmed the error output and backtrace to a little bit further back as `RUSTDOC_LOG=rustdoc` provides a TOOON of logs. If you need me to upload the whole thing, I can. ``` INFO rustdoc finished with rustc INFO rustdoc going to format DEBUG rustdoc::formats::cache folding mod "None", id DefId(0:0 ~ tmp2[8787]) DEBUG rustdoc::formats::cache folding struct "Some("S")", id DefId(0:3 ~ tmp2[8787]::S) thread 'rustc' panicked at 'index out of bounds: the len is 4 but the index is 4', compiler/rustc_hir/src/definitions.rs:47:9 note: run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=1` environment variable to display a backtrace error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic error: Unrecognized option: 'crate-version' error: could not document `tmp2` Caused by: process didn't exit successfully: `rustdoc --edition=2018 --crate-type lib --crate-name tmp2 src/lib.rs -o /home/dsmyth/Code/Rust/tmp2/target/doc --error-format=json --json=diagnostic-rendered-ansi -L dependency=/home/dsmyth/Code/Rust/tmp2/target/debug/deps --crate-version 0.1.0` (exit code: 1) ```
Backtrace

``` INFO rustdoc finished with rustc INFO rustdoc going to format DEBUG rustdoc::formats::cache folding mod "None", id DefId(0:0 ~ tmp2[8787]) DEBUG rustdoc::formats::cache folding struct "Some("S")", id DefId(0:3 ~ tmp2[8787]::S) thread 'rustc' panicked at 'index out of bounds: the len is 4 but the index is 4', compiler/rustc_hir/src/definitions.rs:47:9 stack backtrace: 0: rust_begin_unwind 1: core::panicking::panic_fmt 2: core::panicking::panic_bounds_check 3: rustc_hir::definitions::Definitions::def_key 4: rustc_hir::definitions::DefPath::make 5: rustc_hir::definitions::Definitions::def_path 6: rustc_middle::ty::context::TyCtxt::def_path_debug_str 7: rustc_interface::callbacks::def_id_debug 8: core::fmt::write 9: ::fmt 10: core::fmt::write 11: core::fmt::Write::write_fmt 12: ::record_debug 13: tracing_core::field::ValueSet::record 14: as tracing_subscriber::layer::Layer>::on_event 15: tracing_core::dispatcher::get_default 16: tracing_core::event::Event::dispatch 17: ::fold_item 18: alloc::vec::source_iter_marker:: for alloc::vec::Vec>::from_iter 19: rustdoc::fold::DocFolder::fold_inner_recur 20: rustdoc::fold::DocFolder::fold_item_recur 21: ::fold_item 22: rustdoc::fold::DocFolder::fold_crate 23: rustdoc::formats::cache::Cache::from_krate 24: rustdoc::formats::renderer::run_format 25: rustdoc::run_renderer 26: rustc_session::utils::::time 27: rustc_interface::passes::QueryContext::enter 28: rustc_interface::queries::::enter 29: rustc_span::with_source_map 30: rustc_interface::interface::create_compiler_and_run 31: rustdoc::main_options 32: scoped_tls::ScopedKey::set 33: rustc_span::with_session_globals note: Some details are omitted, run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=full` for a verbose backtrace. error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic error: Unrecognized option: 'crate-version' error: could not document `tmp2` Caused by: process didn't exit successfully: `rustdoc --edition=2018 --crate-type lib --crate-name tmp2 src/lib.rs -o /home/dsmyth/Code/Rust/tmp2/target/doc --error-format=json --json=diagnostic-rendered-ansi -L dependency=/home/dsmyth/Code/Rust/tmp2/target/debug/deps --crate-version 0.1.0` (exit code: 1) ```
